Key Match Events: Virgil van Dijk was sent off in the 79th minute for a lunge on Kevin Csoboth
Denzel Dumfries headed a brilliant free kick from Cody Gakpo into the back of the net to earn his side a point in the 83rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Netherlands were left to rue Van Dijk's red card, but they managed to secure a hard-fought point against Hungary
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands had 84% of the ball in the opening 45 minutes of action
Hungary scored with their only attempt on target in the first half
Others: Zsolt Nagy was the star of the show, with the left-sided wing-back putting in an excellent performance for Hungary, and it was his brilliant assist that allowed the hosts to make the breakthrough
